DRW Trading Group | Software Engineers |Chicago | ONSITE

DRW is a proprietary trading firm, headquartered in Chicago, that is at the intersection of trading, technology, and quantitative research. Join our highly talented team of technologists who are passionate about their craft, continuous learning, and collaborating with their peers to build cutting edge tech. We are hiring for a variety of roles including low latency C++ Developers, FPGA Engineers, C# Developers, Trade Support Engineers, Quantitative Researchers and DevOps.

You can view all of our open positions here: https://goo.gl/hoJe8F or reach out to us directly at recruiters <at> drw.com for more information.
